title: Wallpaper Base16 Converter

title: Chinese Script Highlighter
description: A quickly-put-together website to help me (and my classmates) highlight new words that are not part of the syllabus, and automatically compile new the new words with meanings and pronunciations. Required for our LAC3202 presentation.

title: Main Website
description: This site is also a way for me to learn static site generation and JSX frameworks!

description: Fun little Tasklist Chatbot for NUS CS2103T Individual Project, adhering to Iterative Prototyping.

title: MediBase3
description: Patient addressbook aimed at Doctors for NUS CS2103T Team Project, to learn Team-based Software Development.

title: Dotfiles
description: Dotfiles based around NixOS (and Arch on another branch).
